Whalers Village Front Street many good restaurants
There are lots of facilities and restaurants and a great beach for swimming or tanning or even morning yoga
There is a great beach walk along the beautiful hotels with restaurants and shopping center Great atmosphere at night

A great snorkeling beach with turtles to be seen within 50 feet of shore the black rock cliff diving pools connected by a river nightly live entertainment and just a short drive from old Lahaina for shopping restaurants and sightseeing excursions
Shuttle service offers free transportation to shopping dining and other resorts
Location rooms were updated and clean restaurants with delicious food On the beach
Thanks to restaurant manger Rory Cosma for making it extra special
Haley in the bar lounge took really good care of us on several occasions
The staff at the restaurants bars pool spa were nice and helpful
1: Also they make made to order omelettes and breakfast is available from 6 1am
All the bars and restaurants are closed
We arrived there on Saturday Oct 6th and had dinner and then a lovely day on Sunday by the pool having drinks lunch etc
Overall happy with stay better vegetarian options would of been nice
The breakfast buffet at the hotel usual buffet items for two with iced tea was 51 with tip to give you an idea
I was n’t going to eat at the hotel why would I when there are so many restaurants near by and I do n’t need my room cleaned every day so honestly my stay was great
All bars and restaurants at hotel closed at 6PM
So we had gone to other hotels for bars and places to eat
I am just glad my actual wedding was at a restaurant and not on the property
2: However as a pregnant woman I found the meal choices very limited and I would have to select burgers or hotdogs as the ‘ cooked ’ options that I could eat
If you are lounging by the pool be sure to check out the Cliff Dive Bar
But the very apologetic staff gave us dining credit so we could at least eat
food selection overall was not great
Cons When we checked in the clerk convinced us to upgrade to another room in another building Building 6 west side for more and complimentary breakfast coupons he said it was the best of the best
My wife I are not huge eaters so we generally split entrees when we dine out
